title: Tactics
description: Kantarou has had the 6th sense to see demons for as long as he can remember, and has become friends with them, but also has the job of “yokai busting”. With his tengu and his kitsune, they solve mysteries, and help the yokai situation in Japan.
genre: [<Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> Drama>, <Genre -> Fantasy>, <Genre -> Mystery>, <Genre -> Shounen>, <Genre -> Super Power>]
